text: Arthur Keppel-Jones (1909–1996) was a South African-born, Canadian-based historian and science fiction writer. He was a senior lecturer at the University of the Witwatersrand until he emigrated to Canada. ==Selected works== * ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1996 deaths Category:South African emigrants to Canada Category:University of the Witwatersrand academics Category:South African historians Category:South African science fiction writers Category:20th-century historians
title: Arthur Keppel-Jones
